Flavor Text: Small, Frail, Weak, and feels every ounce of pain,\nbut with sacrifice comes value.
An odd amount of squirrels curled up in a ball,\nshedding some as it moves around.
Curious...\nI'm... not actually sure what this does...
Strange...\nDid I do that...?
Interesting...\nHm... I donâ€™t recall making that one...
Be careful, for if you call him cute he will\nbite a hole straight through your leg.
A massive brute of a beast, keep an eye out or it will\npush you along with it while moving.
What may be a measly worker ant right now,\ncan become an overwhelming force of ant's quickly.
A proud and vicious predator, in packs or by lonesome\nit will rend its prey.
From under the brush comes its venomous bite,\neven a simple bite will kill.
An egg from a clever bird, even threatening\nin this state, soon it will become a blight of a bird.
A surprisingly strong fish, with the power\nof attacking its prey then quickly slipping away.
It can smell a drop of blood from miles away,\nonce it does it will come to its prey immediately.
A mans best friend specialized in defending its owner\nit will pounce in front of anything it doesnt trust.
The royal mother of all ants alike, if you see it\nkill it at first sight or there will be ants of plenty.
The meek and feeble sparrow, it gathers insects to\nfeed its offspring, and also to eat for themselves.
A swift bird of its calibar, it swims to avoid its\npredators and flys to avoid its prey.
An ambitious young pup, mind you it is a feisty one,\nand as soon as it grows up your in for a treat!
It watches and sees everything and especially keeps an\neye out for creatures that are above them.
A truly worthy sacrifice, the black goat is one of\nthe greatest honor you can grant for sacrifice.
If its nice you will get treasure,\nhowever, if you're not nice, it will give you scrap.
"Why what a total misplay! Why choose me, there\nare sooo many better options!"
"It is time my dear insect friends, time to scavenge\nfor some bones that is! NOW DIG!!"
"A vacuous landscape fills my vision, illustrious and\nvariegated shall it be once more!"
"God F*$%ing Dammit, Drow Knight!!! Why am I always\ndragged here with you?!?!"
"Golly! So many new faces to see around here!! I excite!!"
Be careful around this nest, many creatures lie within,\nready to sting you at any moment!
